Title: Priest
Effect: The Order cool down is reduced by 5% in this church the priest is assigned to
Name: Gabriel Ketting
Description: Gabriel, dissatisfied with simply aiding those that enter his church, can often be seen blessing troops before battle and praying for the fallen afterwards.

Title: Irrigation Master
Effect: Wheat fields around a Farm can grow on unfertile land
Name: Stefan of Germania
Description: Hailing from Germania, Stefan brings his knowledge of dowsing and irrigation, which has helped return acres of arid ground to fertile farmland.
